motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of July 10, 2023, City Council Meeting Minutes • Approval of Conversion of Contracted Positions to City Positions

motions.title: Motion to Modify Agenda - Move Budget Amendment to Business Item #6
motions.description: Motion to take the approval of the Budget Amendment out of item number 3 and move it into business items as number 6.

motions.title: Amendment to Position Allocation and Compensation Chart
motions.description: Approval of amendment to position allocation and compensation chart for new compensation and benefits.

motions.title: Facility Usage Agreement with Dunwoody High School Softball Booster Club
motions.description: Approval of facility usage agreement with Dunwoody High School Softball Booster Club Inc. for the completed softball field.

motions.title: Motion to Amend Agenda Item #5 - Add 'and Alcohol' to Moratorium Title
motions.description: Motion to amend agenda item number 5 to read: A Resolution Extending a Moratorium on Drug Rehabilitation Centers and other Facilities for Treatment of Drug and Alcohol Dependency, adding the words 'and alcohol'.

motions.title: Resolution Extending Moratorium on Drug Rehabilitation Centers
motions.description: Approval of resolution extending moratorium on drug rehabilitation centers and other facilities for treatment of drug and alcohol dependency through February 27, 2024, with study in first 90 days.

motions.title: Resolution Amending Budget for Fiscal Year 2023
motions.description: Approval of resolution amending the budget for fiscal year 2023 for adjustments to the compensation chart.
